definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
ethnic township (formal village level subdivision of PRC county)

sentences.english: Only few States continue to maintain a separate chancery court.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数几个州继续保持独立的衡平法院。

sentences.english: Only a handful of bridges have major support beams made from them.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数桥梁采用纤维增强塑料的主体支撑梁。

sentences.english: The Bahá'í Faith is currently the largest religious minority in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈伊教是目前伊朗最大的少数派宗教。

sentences.english: The traditional libraries in China were unenlightened and just opened for few people.
sentences.chinese: 传统中国藏书机构是封闭，并且只提供少数的人使用。

sentences.english: MHK is the shortened form of the Chinese Proficiency Test for Minorities in China.
sentences.chinese: MHK是中国少数民族汉语水平等级考试的简称。

sentences.english: Nagaina was one of the few who were also useful to him.
sentences.chinese: 纳甘娜是其中少数几个对他有用者之一。

sentences.english: The Northeast is one of the relatively few regions in the country that are actually well suited to lawns.
sentences.chinese: 北东郡是这个国家少数相对适合种植草坪的郡县之一。

sentences.english: Concubinage is still the privilege of the rich class, but there still exist the phenomenon that the civilian concubinage.
sentences.chinese: 纳妾虽属于富贵阶层的特权，但平民纳妾也不在少数。

sentences.english: This is one of those rare cases.
sentences.chinese: 本案属于那种极少数案例之一。

sentences.english: The majority of users are mine production dispatching users except a few administrative users.
sentences.chinese: 除少数行政用户外外，大部分留给矿生产调度用户。

sentences.english: Zero-coupon securities have little risk, but they do have a few tax disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 零息债券没有什么风险，但他们确实有少数税务缺点。

sentences.english: He is one of very few Hispanic people to have run a major US corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他是少数经营美国大公司的美籍西班牙人之一。

sentences.english: Only a small number of dead enders were still in his thrall.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数人死亡的诱惑仍然在他的崇信。

sentences.english: At that time, only a few officials or divination people.
sentences.chinese: 当时，只有少数官吏或卜人使用。

sentences.english: Then there are the few brae souls who grab at its horns and hang on at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 只有极少数的灵魂不畏艰险，不惜一切。

sentences.english: In the Warring States Period, wars often broke out between Zhao and the minority groups in the north.
sentences.chinese: 战国时，赵国和北方的少数民族之间经常爆发战争。

definition: for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
in large part/the greater part/the majority
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
Dadu, capital of China during the Yuan Dynasty (1280-1368), modern day Beijing
there are plenty of such people
